attributes.action: give the disabled the same benefits as the pensioners get each year especially the fuel allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the disabled get on average only half of what the pensioners get in their benefit rises each year.  If the pensioners get £5.00 then the disabled get only £2.50 Even when the pensioners got only .80p a few years ago the disabled only got .55p that same year. Many pensioners can get out of their homes saving fuel bills, the disabled cannot always do this yet they do not get the fuel allowance.
